nz.org.venice.quote
Interface QuoteListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener
public interface QuoteListener
extends java.util.EventListener

Interface for classes that are listening for when new intra-day quotes are downloaded. All classes that are quote listeners will receive an event when a new intra-day quote has been downloaded and they should refresh any intra-day quote displays.

Author:
Andrew Leppard
See Also:
IDQuoteCache, QuoteEvent

Method Summary
 void newQuotes(QuoteEvent quoteEvent)
          Called when a new intra-day quote has been downloaded.
